p1: I'm a full stack engineer in Berlin, who enjoys programming and creating complex web applications that are both feature rich and responsive.
p2: I didn't know what to do after school, and I've always been curious about how coding can create amazing apps out of 0's and 1's. After searching around for courses, I kept seeing The Odin Project recommended, so I gave it a try. What started as curiosity quickly became a passion and since then, I'm hooked on programming.
p3: When I'm not coding, I'm most likely doing one of the big 3's: playing Video Games, playing the Piano, or at the gym. ðŸŽ® ðŸŽ¹ ðŸ’ª
